Class CouponDAODB

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CouponDAODB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponDAO

    public class CouponDAODB
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponDAO
    AN object designed to contact a DB to perform operations that are related to coupons

    איתי מרצבך

        public void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws CouponServerException
        remove coupon from DB , need object of coupon. this method don't remove all the past purchase. for this you need the method removeCouponPurchase(long).
        Specified by:

        public void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
